house_listing.house_description: This property is currently being totally renovated! Refinishing hardwood, painting thru-out, new carpeting, some new windows downstairs. Smoke damage upstairs will be completely renovated. Repairs to be completed by the end of december 1999.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, StorageSpace, Workshop
